fields.fieldText: Error! This Service Appointment does not have an Installer assigned to it. So it cannot be set to In Progress status.

fields.name: Error_No_Status_Transition_Available
fields.fieldText: Error! This Service Appointment is already completed. There are no status transitions to be made anymore.

fields.fieldText: You have now paused the Service Appointment. It can be resumed at later time.
